headline: Moody's says Alphabet's victory in code copyright case is credit positive
description: Moody's On Alphabet : Moody's says alphabet inc.'s victory in code copyright case is credit positive; ratings unchanged . Court's decision in favor of google is positive for co as it does not have to incur damages .Alphabet's ratings and outlook remain unchanged as impact of the court's decision will not change the company's credit profile.

headline: YouTube to apply tougher treatment to videos flagged as potential violations of policies on "hate speech"‍​
description: Aug 1 (Reuters) - YouTube : :YouTube says will soon be applying tougher treatment to videos flagged by users as potential violations of policies on "hate speech and violent extremism"‍​.YouTube - If flagged videos don’t violate policies but contain "controversial religious or supremacist content", they will be placed in limited state.YouTube says will begin to roll the new treatment out to videos on desktop versions of YouTube in coming weeks - Blog‍​.‍YouTube says flagged videos will remain on YouTube behind an interstitial, won’t be recommended, won’t be monetized, won’t have key features - Blog.

headline: ACCC Releases Preliminary Report Into Google, Facebook And Australian News & Advertising
description: Dec 10 (Reuters) - Australian Competition & Consumer Commission::RELEASES PRELIMINARY REPORT INTO GOOGLE, FACEBOOK AND AUSTRALIAN NEWS AND ADVERTISING.PRELIMINARY REPORT CONTAINS 11 PRELIMINARY RECOMMENDATIONS AND EIGHT AREAS FOR FURTHER ANALYSIS.FURTHER CONCERNED WITH LARGE AMOUNT & VARIETY OF DATA WHICH DIGITAL PLATFORMS SUCH AS GOOGLE AND FACEBOOK COLLECT ON AUSTRALIAN CONSUMERS.REPORT OUTLINES ACCC'S CONCERNS REGARDING MARKET POWER HELD BY KEY PLATFORMS, INCLUDING IMPACT ON AUSTRALIAN BUSINESSES.CONCERNED ABOUT LENGTH, COMPLEXITY, AMBIGUITY OF ONLINE TERMS OF SERVICE, PRIVACY POLICIES.REPORT INCLUDES PROPOSAL TO PREVENT GOOGLE’S INTERNET BROWSER BEING INSTALLED AS DEFAULT BROWSER ON MOBILE DEVICES, COMPUTERS & TABLETS.PROPOSES NEW OR EXISTING REGULATORY AUTHORITY TO INVESTIGATE, MONITOR, REPORT HOW LARGE DIGITAL PLATFORMS RANK, DISPLAY ADVERTISEMENTS & NEWS.REPORT INCLUDES PROPOSAL TO ALSO PREVENT GOOGLE’S SEARCH ENGINE BEING INSTALLED AS A DEFAULT SEARCH ENGINE ON INTERNET BROWSERS.ADDITIONAL PRELIMINARY RECOMMENDATIONS DEAL WITH COPYRIGHT, AND TAKE-DOWN ORDERS, AND THE REVIEW OF EXISTING, DISPARATE MEDIA REGULATIONS.CONSIDERING RECOMMENDATION FOR CODE OF PRACTICE FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS’ DATA COLLECTION TO BETTER INFORM CONSUMERS, IMPROVE BARGAINING POWER..ALSO UNCOVERED CONCERNS OF CERTAIN DIGITAL PLATFORMS BREACHED COMPETITION OR CONSUMER LAWS, CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING 5 SUCH ALLEGATIONS.

headline: Moody's Says That A DOJ Antitrust Probe Into Alphabet's Google Business Would Be Credit Negative
description: June 5 (Reuters) - Moody's: :MOODY'S SAYS THAT A DOJ ANTITRUST PROBE INTO ALPHABET'S GOOGLE BUSINESS WOULD BE CREDIT NEGATIVE.MOODY'S SAYS AT THIS TIME THERE IS NO IMPACT ON ALPHABET'S AA2 LONG-TERM DEBT RATING, PRIME-1 SHORT TERM CREDIT RATING OR STABLE OUTLOOK..MOODY'S SAYS ITS MOST IMPORTANT FUNDAMENTAL CONCERN IS WHETHER REGULATION/ACTIONS IMPOSED ON ALPHABET MATERIALLY, PERMANENTLY ALTERS ITS BUSINESS MODEL.MOODY'S SAYS AS THERE ARE ONLY MEDIA REPORTS SO FAR, NEGATIVE RULINGS THAT WOULD MATERIALLY IMPACT ALPHABET'S CREDIT STANDING REMAIN LOW PROBABILITY.MOODY'S SAYS BELIEVE ALPHABET WELL CONDITIONED FOR POTENTIAL PROBES & HAS SO FAR EFFECTIVELY WARDED OFF ACTIONS THAT WOULD KINDLE OUR MAJOR CONCERNS.MOODY'S SAYS EXPECT SOME OF ALPHABET'S FCF IN 2019 CAN BE EARMARKED FOR POTENTIAL INTERNATIONAL FINES WITHOUT COMPROMISING ABILITY TO INVEST IN GROWTH.MOODY'S SAYS EXPECT SOME OF ALPHABET'S FCF IN 2019 CAN BE EARMARKED FOR POTENTIAL INTERNATIONAL FINES WITHOUT MATERIALLY ALTERING ITS LIQUIDITY.

headline: UK's CMA Calls For New Regulatory Regime To Tackle Google, Facebook's Market Power
description: July 1 (Reuters) - UK's Competition and Markets Authority::UK'S CMA - IS CALLING ON GOVERNMENT TO INTRODUCE A NEW PRO-COMPETITION REGULATORY REGIME TO TACKLE GOOGLE AND FACEBOOK'S MARKET POWER.CMA - CONCERNED THAT GOOGLE AND FACEBOOK DEVELOPED SUCH "UNASSAILABLE MARKET POSITIONS" THAT RIVALS CAN NO LONGER COMPETE ON EQUAL TERMS.UK'S CMA - RECOMMENDATION TO GOVERNMENT ON TECH COMPANIES IS RESULT OF A YEAR-LONG EXAMINATION OF MARKETS.CMA - RECOMMENDING NEW PRO-COMPETITION REGULATORY REGIME TO GOVERN BEHAVIOUR OF MAJOR PLATFORMS FUNDED BY DIGITAL ADVERTISING, LIKE GOOGLE, FACEBOOK.CMA - FOUND THAT NEWSPAPERS ARE RELIANT ON GOOGLE AND FACEBOOK FOR ALMOST 40% OF ALL VISITS TO THEIR SITES.CMA - WORKING WITH ICO AND OFCOM, CMA IS FORMALLY LAUNCHING A DIGITAL MARKETS TASKFORCE.CMA - PROPOSED WITHIN NEW REGIME 'DIGITAL MARKETS UNIT' TO HAVE ABILITY TO ORDER FACEBOOK TO INCREASE INTEROPERABILITY WITH COMPETING PLATFORMS.CMA - PROPOSED NEW REGIME SHOULD HAVE ABILITY TO ORDER GOOGLE TO OPEN UP CLICK, QUERY DATA TO RIVAL SEARCH ENGINES.CMA - PROPOSED WITHIN NEW REGIME A 'DIGITAL MARKETS UNIT' TO HAVE ABILITY TO RESTRICT GOOGLE'S ABILITY TO SECURE PLACE AS DEFAULT SEARCH ENGINE.CMA - PROPOSED WITHIN 'DIGITAL MARKETS UNIT' TO HAVE ABILITY TO ORDER SEPARATION OF PLATFORMS WHERE NECESSARY TO ENSURE HEALTHY COMPETITION.

headline: UK Competition Watchdog To Investigate Google's Browser Changes
description: Jan 8 (Reuters) - Competition and Markets Authority::COMPETITION AND MKTS  - CMA TO INVESTIGATE GOOGLE’S BROWSER CHANGES.CMA - HAS OPENED AN INVESTIGATION INTO GOOGLE'S PROPOSALS TO REMOVE THIRD PARTY COOKIES AND OTHER FUNCTIONALITIES FROM ITS CHROME BROWSER..CMA - INVESTIGATION TO ASSESS IF PROPOSALS COULD CAUSE AD SPEND TO BECOME EVEN MORE CONCENTRATED ON GOOGLE'S ECOSYSTEM AT EXPENSE OF ITS COMPETITORS.CMA - RECEIVED COMPLAINTS INCLUDING FROM MARKETERS FOR AN OPEN WEB LTD WHICH ALLEGE THAT, THROUGH PROPOSALS, GOOGLE IS ABUSING ITS DOMINANT POSITION.CMA - HAS NOT REACHED ANY CONCLUSIONS AT THIS STAGE AS TO WHETHER OR NOT COMPETITION LAW HAS BEEN INFRINGED.CMA - TO CONTINUE TO ENGAGE WITH GOOGLE, OTHER MARKET PARTICIPANTS TO ENSURE PRIVACY & COMPETITION CONCERNS CAN BE ADDRESSED AS PROPOSALS ARE DEVELOPED.

headline: ACCC Says Dominance Of Apple And Google's App Stores Impacting Competition And Consumers
description: April 28 (Reuters) - Australian Competition & Consumer Commission::SAYS DOMINANCE OF APPLE AND GOOGLE'S APP STORES IMPACTING COMPETITION AND CONSUMERS.APPLE'S APP STORE AND GOOGLE'S PLAY STORE HAVE SIGNIFICANT MARKET POWER IN THE DISTRIBUTION OF MOBILE APPS IN AUSTRALIA.CONCERNED WITH RESTRICTIONS BY APPLE, GOOGLE WHICH MEAN DEVELOPERS HAVE NO CHOICE BUT TO USE THEIR PAYMENT SYSTEMS FOR IN-APP PURCHASES.PUT FORWARD A SERIES OF POTENTIAL MEASURES IN RESPONSE TO ITS FINDINGS, INCLUDING THAT CONSUMERS BE ABLE TO RATE AND REVIEW ALL APPS.HAVE IDENTIFIED A NUMBER OF AREAS WHERE ACTION IS REQUIRED AND HAVE PUT FORWARD POTENTIAL MEASURES TO ADDRESS AREAS OF PARTICULAR CONCERN.WILL REVISIT ISSUES RAISED IN THE REPORT DURING THE COURSE OF THE FIVE-YEAR DIGITAL PLATFORM SERVICES INQUIRY.REGULATION MAY BE REQUIRED IF APPLE AND GOOGLE FAIL TO TAKE STEPS TO ADDRESS THE CONCERNS IDENTIFIED.

headline: France's Le Maire welcomes antitrust fine against Google
description: June 7 (Reuters) - :French finance minister Bruno Le Maire said in a statement he welcomed the decision by the French antitrust watchdog to fine Google 220 million euros after a probe found it abused its market power in the intricate ad business online..Le Maire said it is paramount to impose fair competition rules on digital giants..Google's ad practices were a "serious" matter and have been rightly sancionned..

headline: UK's CMA To Scrutinise Apple And Google Mobile Ecosystems
description: June 15 (Reuters) - UK's CMA::CMA TO SCRUTINISE APPLE AND GOOGLE MOBILE ECOSYSTEMS.CMA - LAUNCHED MARKET STUDY INTO APPLE'S, GOOGLE'S MOBILE ECOSYSTEMS OVER CONCERNS THEY HAVE MARKET POWER WHICH IS HARMING USERS AND OTHER BUSINESSES.UK'S CMA SAYS THE CMA IS LOOKING INTO WHETHER THE TWO FIRMS’ CONTROL OVER MOBILE ECOSYSTEMS IS STIFLING COMPETITION ACROSS A RANGE OF DIGITAL MARKETS.UK'S CMA - STUDY WILL ALSO EXAMINE ANY EFFECTS OF FIRMS' MARKET POWER OVER OTHER BUSINESSES.CMA-CLOSER LOOK AT WHETHER FIRMS' EFFECTIVE DUOPOLY OVER SUPPLY OF OPERATING SYSTEMS, APP STORES, WEB BROWSERS COULD BE RESULTING IN CONSUMERS LOSING OUT.CMA - CMA CONCERNED TWO FIRMS’ CONTROL OVER MOBILE ECOSYSTEMS COULD LEAD TO REDUCED INNOVATION ACROSS SECTOR, CONSUMERS PAYING HIGHER PRICES FOR DEVICES, APPS.CMA-CONCERNED MOBILE ECOSYSTEMS CONTROL COULD LEAD TO REDUCED INNOVATION ACROSS SECTOR AND CONSUMERS PAYING HIGHER PRICES FOR DEVICES AND APPS.UK'S CMA - HAS 12 MONTHS TO CONCLUDE THE STUDY.CMA-ALSO CONCERNED MOBILE ECOSYSTEMS CONTROL COULD LEAD TO CONSUMERS PAYING HIGHER PRICES FOR OTHER GOODS, SERVICES DUE TO HIGHER AD PRICES.Further company coverage: AAPL.OGOOGL.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: UK's CMA Opens Formal Probe Into Amazon, Google Over Fake Reviews
description: June 25 (Reuters) - Competition and Markets Authority::COMPETITION AND MKTS  - CMA INVESTIGATION: AMAZON AND GOOGLE FAKE REVIEWS.COMPETITION AND MKTS  - CMA INVESTIGATION: AMAZON AND GOOGLE FAKE REVIEWS.CMA TO INVESTIGATE AMAZON AND GOOGLE OVER FAKE REVIEWS.CMA - HAS OPENED A FORMAL PROBE INTO AMAZON AND GOOGLE OVER CONCERNS THAT THEY HAVE NOT BEEN DOING ENOUGH TO COMBAT FAKE REVIEWS ON THEIR SITES.UK'S CMA - ALSO CONCERNED THAT AMAZON'S SYSTEMS HAVE BEEN FAILING ADEQUATELY TO PREVENT AND DETER SOME SELLERS FROM MANIPULATING PRODUCT LISTINGS.

headline: Australia's ACCC Says Google's Dominance In Ad Tech Supply Chain Harms Businesses & Consumers
description: Sept 28 (Reuters) - Australian Competition & Consumer Commission::GOOGLE'S DOMINANCE IN AD TECH SUPPLY CHAIN HARMS BUSINESSES AND CONSUMERS.REPORT FINDS THAT GOOGLE HAS A DOMINANT POSITION IN KEY PARTS OF THE AD TECH SUPPLY CHAIN.CONCLUDES ENFORCEMENT ACTION UNDER AUSTRALIA'S EXISTING COMPETITION LAWS ALONE IS NOT SUFFICIENT TO ADDRESS COMPETITION ISSUES IN THE SECTOR.REPORT ESTIMATES MORE THAN 90% OF AD IMPRESSIONS TRADED VIA THE AD TECH SUPPLY CHAIN PASSED THROUGH AT LEAST ONE GOOGLE SERVICE IN 2020.REPORT FINDS THAT GOOGLE HAS USED ITS POSITION TO PREFERENCE ITS OWN SERVICES AND SHIELD THEM FROM COMPETITION.CONCLUDES ACCC SHOULD BE GIVEN POWERS TO DEVELOP SPECIFIC RULES IN RESPONSE.REPORT TO LOOK AT IF PROPOSED RULES FOR AD TECH NEED TO FORM PART OF BROADER REGULATORY SCHEME TO ADDRESS COMMON COMPETITION, CONSUMER CONCERNS.RECOMMENDS AN INDUSTRY STANDARD TO ENABLE FULL AND INDEPENDENT VERIFICATION OF SERVICES ADVERTISERS USE IN SUPPLY CHAIN.

headline: Tenaga Nasional Berhad Selects Capgemini And Google Cloud To Accelerate Innovation And Agility
description: Dec 9 (Reuters) - Capgemini SE <CAPP.PA>::TENAGA NASIONAL BERHAD SELECTS CAPGEMINI AND GOOGLE CLOUD TO ACCELERATE INNOVATION AND AGILITY.IN COLLABORATION WITH CAPGEMINI AND GOOGLE CLOUD, TNB LAUNCHED A COMPREHENSIVE ENTERPRISE-WIDE API ADOPTION PROGRAM TO BUILD, DEPLOY AND SCALE APIS AND INTRODUCE NEW AGILE WAYS OF WORKING TO ACCELERATE ITS DIGITAL MATURITY FROM WITHIN.

description: Nov 7 (Reuters) - Volkswagen AG <VOWG_p.DE>:Says Volkswagen Group and Google work together on quantum computers​.Says cooperation with Google aims to build up specialist knowledge and to carry out practically oriented research​.

headline: Avis Budget To Continue To Expand Operations With Waymo
description: Feb 22 (Reuters) - Avis Budget Group Inc <CAR.O>::"WILL CONTINUE TO EXPAND OUR OPERATIONS WITH WAYMO" - CONF CALL‍​.TALKING TO OTHER MOBILITY SOLUTION PROVIDERS, SEE SOME OF THOSE UNFOLD AS WELL OVER 2018 AND INTO 2019  - CONF CALL‍​.SEES ABOUT $20 BILLION HIGHER VEHICLE INTEREST EXPENSE IN 2018, PARTLY RESULTING FROM RISING U.S. INTEREST RATES.COST HEADWINDS IN 2018 WILL BE PARTIALLY OFFSET BY HIGH UTILIZATION - CONF CALL.WE'RE NOT LOSING SHARE IN CORPORATE BUSINESS, WE ARE STARTING TO SEE MORE LEISURE BUSINESS COMING THROUGH.

headline: Avis Budget To Continue To Expand Operations With Waymo
description: Feb 22 (Reuters) - Avis Budget Group Inc <CAR.O>::AVIS BUDGET GROUP SEES ABOUT $20 MILLION HIGHER VEHICLE INTEREST EXPENSE IN 2018, PARTLY RESULTING FROM RISING U.S. INTEREST RATES."WILL CONTINUE TO EXPAND OUR OPERATIONS WITH WAYMO" - CONF CALL‍​.TALKING TO OTHER MOBILITY SOLUTION PROVIDERS, SEE SOME OF THOSE UNFOLD AS WELL OVER 2018 AND INTO 2019  - CONF CALL‍​.COST HEADWINDS IN 2018 WILL BE PARTIALLY OFFSET BY HIGH UTILIZATION - CONF CALL.WE'RE NOT LOSING SHARE IN CORPORATE BUSINESS, WE ARE STARTING TO SEE MORE LEISURE BUSINESS COMING THROUGH.

headline: Repsol And Google Cloud To Use Big Data And AI To Optimize Refinery Management
description: June 4 (Reuters) - Repsol SA <REP.MC>::REPSOL AND GOOGLE CLOUD TO LAUNCH A PROJECT THAT WILL USE BIG DATA AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO OPTIMIZE REFINERY MANAGEMENT.PROJECT HAS POTENTIAL TO ADD 30 CENTS ON A DOLLAR TO REPSOL’S REFINED BARREL MARGIN, OR $20 MILLION ANNUALLY FOR TARRAGONA REFINERY.

headline: Alphabet Says EC's Charge Of $5.07 Billion Will Reduce Q2 GAAP EPS By Full Amount
description: July 18 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET INC SAYS IN Q2 RESULTS WILL REPORT SEPARATE OPERATING EXPENSE LINE FOR $5.07 BILLION CHARGE ON THE INCOME STATEMENT.ALPHABET INC ON ACCOUNTING FOR EC ANDROID FINE IN Q2 RESULTS SAYS FINE IS NOT TAX DEDUCTIBLE.ALPHABET INC - THE EC'S CHARGE WILL REDUCE Q2 GAAP NET INCOME AND GAAP EPS BY FULL AMOUNT.

headline: Alphabet Reports Quarterly GAAP EPS of $4.54
description: July 23 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::QUARTERLY GAAP REVENUE $32,657 MILLION VERSUS $26,010 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY DILUTED EPS INCLUDING FINES (GAAP) $4.54.QUARTERLY INCREASE IN CONSTANT CURRENCY REVENUE WAS 23 PERCENT.QUARTERLY GOOGLE ADVERTISING REVENUE $28,087 MILLION VERSUS $22,672 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY DILUTED EPS EXCLUDING FINES $11.75.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $9.59, REVENUE VIEW $32.17 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S.QUARTERLY OTHER BETS REVENUE $145 MILLION.QUARTERLY GOOGLE SEGMENT REVENUE $32,512 MILLION VERSUS $25,913 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY TOTAL TRAFFIC ACQUISITION COSTS $6,420 MILLION VERSUS $5,091 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY PAID CLICKS ON GOOGLE PROPERTIES UP 58 PERCENT.QUARTERLY COST-PER-CLICK ON GOOGLE PROPERTIES DOWN 22 PERCENT.

headline: Amazon In Recent Months Has Been Pursuing Exclusive Livestreaming Deals - Bloomberg
description: Aug 15 (Reuters) - :AMAZON IN RECENT MONTHS HAS BEEN PURSUING EXCLUSIVE LIVESTREAMING DEALS WITH DOZENS OF POPULAR MEDIA COMPANIES AND PERSONALITIES - BLOOMBERG.AMAZON'S TWITCH OFFERING MINIMUM GUARANTEES OF FEW MILLION DOLLARS/YEAR, AS WELL AS A SHARE OF FUTURE ADVERTISING SALES, SUBSCRIPTION REVENUE - BLOOMBERG.AT A RECENT STAFF MEETING, TWITCH CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER EMMETT SHEAR SET A TARGET OF $1 BILLION IN AD SALES FOR TWITCH - BLOOMBERG.

headline: Nordea Brings Google Pay To Customers
description: Oct 30 (Reuters) - Nordea Bank Abp <NDAFI.HE>::NORDEA BRINGS GOOGLE PAY TO CUSTOMERS.NORDEA CUSTOMERS IN ALL NORDIC COUNTRIES CAN NOW USE GOOGLE PAY AT CONTACTLESS PAYMENT TERMINALS AND IN APPS AND ONLINE STORES..

headline: Spotify Technology S.A. reports Q3 results
description: Nov 1 (Reuters) - Spotify Technology Sa <SPOT.N>::SPOTIFY TECHNOLOGY S.A. ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THIRD QUARTER 2018.SEES Q4 REVENUE EUR 1.35 BILLION TO EUR 1.55 BILLION.SEES Q4 REVENUE UP 18 TO 35 PERCENT.Q3 REVENUE EUR 1.352 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW EUR 1.34 BILLION.ANNOUNCED A PARTNERSHIP WITH GOOGLE.SPOTIFY WILL OFFER GOOGLE HOME MINI SPEAKERS TO FAMILY PLAN MASTER ACCOUNT HOLDERS IN U.S. DURING HOLIDAY SEASON.STARTING JANUARY 1, 2019, WILL BE ADOPTING NEW LEASING STANDARD AS DICTATED BY IFRS 16.ANTICIPATE GOOGLE PARTNERSHIP TO HAVE ADVERSE IMPACT OF ABOUT 50 BPS ON GROSS MARGIN PROFILE IN Q4.SEES NEGATIVE IMPACT OF ABOUT EUR 20 MILLION FROM FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES ON Q4 REVENUE.AT END OF QUARTER, HELD EUR 1.8 BILLION IN CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS, RESTRICTED CASH, AND SHORT TERM INVESTMENTS.VALUE OF CO'S INVESTMENT IN TENCENT MUSIC ENTERTAINMENT GROUP IS HELD AT A PRICE PER SHARE OF $6.52.GENERATED EUR 80 MILLION IN NET CASH FLOWS FROM OPERATING ACTIVITIES AND €33 MILLION IN FREE CASH FLOW IN Q3.AT QUARTER-END, RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CONTINUES TO MAKE UP GREATEST SHARE OF HIRING, ACCOUNTING FOR MORE THAN 40% OF HEADCOUNT ADDITIONS."INTEND TO ACCELERATE PACE OF INVESTMENT IN RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT AND CONTENT IN 2019".DEMAND IN US REMAINS STRONG AND IS EXPECTED TO OUTSTRIP CO'S AVAILABLE INVENTORY IN Q4.OPERATING EXPENSES TOTALED €348 MILLION IN Q3, RESULTING IN TOTAL OPERATING LOSS OF €6 MILLION FOR QUARTER.

headline: Alphabet Inc Reports Quarterly Diluted EPS Of $12.77
description: Feb 4 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::QUARTERLY REVENUE $39,276 MILLION VERSUS $32,323 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY DILUTED EPS $12.77.Q4 SHR VIEW $10.82, REV VIEW $38.93 BLN -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.QUARTERLY OPERATING MARGIN 21 PERCENT VERSUS 24 PERCENT REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY PAID CLICKS ON GOOGLE PROPERTIES UP 66 PERCENT.QUARTERLY GOOGLE ADVERTISING REVENUE $32,635 MILLION VERSUS $27,227 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY INCREASE IN CONSTANT CURRENCY REVENUES YEAR OVER YEAR OF 23 PERCENT.QUARTERLY OTHER BETS REVENUE $154 MILLION VERSUS $131 MILLION.QUARTERLY COST-PER-CLICK ON GOOGLE PROPERTIES DOWN 29 PERCENT.QUARTERLY TOTAL TRAFFIC ACQUISITION COSTS $7,436 MILLION VERSUS $6,450 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QUARTERLY GOOGLE SEGMENT REVENUE $39,122 MILLION VERSUS $32,192 MILLION.QUARTERLY RESULTS AFFECTED BY A $1.3 BILLION UNREALIZED GAIN RECOGNIZED IN OI&E RELATED TO A NON-MARKETABLE DEBT SECURITY.SAYS HAD $5.5 BILLION GAIN ON EQUITY SECURITIES FOR 2018 WHICH INCLUDES $4.0 BILLION OF NET UNREALIZED GAINS ON EQUITY INVESTMENTS.

headline: Lyft Says Had 18.6 Mln Active Riders For Qtr Ended Dec 31, 2018
description: March 1 (Reuters) - Lyft Inc::LYFT INC SAYS HAD $8.1 BILLION IN BOOKINGS FOR 2018.LYFT SAYS REVENUE FOR 2018 WAS $2.2 BILLION.LYFT INC - NET LOSS FOR 2018 $911.3 MILLION VERSUS $688.3 MILLION IN 2017.LYFT INC SAYS FOR THE QUARTER ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2018, WE HAD 18.6 MILLION ACTIVE RIDERS AND OVER 1.1 MILLION DRIVERS WHO PROVIDED RIDES..LYFT INC - 2018 NET LOSS PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS $43.04.LYFT SAYS CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2018 WAS $517.7 MILLION.LYFT INC - REVENUE PER ACTIVE RIDER FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED DEC. 31, 2018 WAS $36.04 VERSUS $27.34 LAST YEAR.LYFT INC - "OUR DRIVER COMMUNITY HAS EARNED MORE THAN $10 BILLION SINCE INCEPTION".LYFT INC - RIDES FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED DEC. 31, 2018 WAS 178.4 MILLION VERSUS 116.3 MILLION LAST YEAR.LYFT SAYS NUMBER OF FULL-TIME EMPLOYEES HAS INCREASED FROM 1,469 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2016, TO 4,680 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2018 - SEC FILING.LYFT INC SAYS GENERAL MOTORS HOLDINGS LLC BENEFICIALLY OWNED 7.76 PERCENT OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK PRIOR TO OFFERING.LYFT INC SAYS ENTITIES AFFILIATED WITH ALPHABET INC BENEFICIALLY OWNED 5.33 PERCENT OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK PRIOR TO OFFERING.LYFT INC - OUR NETWORK CONTINUES TO GROW WITH ACTIVE RIDERS INCREASING 47% IN Q4 OF 2018 VERSUS Q4 2017.LYFT INC SAYS RAKUTEN EUROPE S.À R.L. BENEFICIALLY OWNED 13.05 PERCENT OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK PRIOR TO OFFERING.LYFT INC SAYS ENTITIES AFFILIATED WITH FIDELITY BENEFICIALLY OWNED 7.71 PERCENT OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK PRIOR TO OFFERING.

headline: Alphabet Expects To Accrue EC Fine In First Quarter Of 2019
description: March 20 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET INC - EXPECTS THAT IT WILL ACCRUE EC FINE IN THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2019..

headline: Alphabet Says Will Report Separate Operating Expense Line For EC Adsense For Search Fine Of $1.7 Bln Charge In Q1
description: April 15 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET - WILL REPORT SEPARATE OPERATING EXPENSE LINE FOR EUROPEAN COMMISSION ADSENSE FOR SEARCH FINE OF $1.7 BILLION CHARGE ON Q1 INCOME STATEMENT.ALPHABET - EC ADSENSE FOR SEARCH FINE IS NOT TAX DEDUCTIBLE, CHARGE WILL REDUCE GAAP OPERATING INCOME, GAAP NET INCOME, GAAP EPS BY FULL AMOUNT IN Q1.

headline: Criteo Believes Future Changes To Chrome Browser To Have Neutral To Potentially Low Single-Digit Negative Impact On Business
description: May 8 (Reuters) - Criteo SA <CRTO.O>::CRITEO - DELIVERED EMAIL TO ITS LARGE INSTITUTIONAL SHAREHOLDERS SETTING FORTH UPDATE ON GOOGLE'S RECENTLY ANNOUNCED FUTURE CHANGES TO CHROME BROWSER.CRITEO - BELIEVE THAT FUTURE CHANGES TO CHROME BROWSER SHOULD HAVE IMPACT ON OUR BUSINESS RANGING FROM NEUTRAL TO POTENTIALLY LOW SINGLE-DIGIT NEGATIVE.

headline: Alphabet Reports Q2 EPS Of $14.21
description: July 25 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::QTRLY REVENUE $38,944 MILLION VERSUS $32,657 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $14.21.QTRLY TOTAL TRAFFIC ACQUISITION COSTS $7,238 MILLION VERSUS $6,420 MILLION.QTRLY INCREASE IN CONSTANT CURRENCY REVENUES YEAR OVER YEAR WAS 22%.QTRLY OPERATING MARGIN 24% VERSUS 9% REPORTED LAST YEAR.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $11.30, REVENUE VIEW $38.15 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.QTRLY GOOGLE ADVERTISING REVENUES $32,601 MILLION VERSUS $28,087 MILLION.QTRLY PAID CLICKS ON GOOGLE PROPERTIES UP 28%.QTRLY GOOGLE SEGMENT REVENUE $38,782 MILLION VERSUS $32,512 MILLION.QTRLY OTHER BETS REVENUE $162 MILLION VERSUS $145 MILLION.QTRLY COST-PER-CLICK ON GOOGLE PROPERTIES DOWN 11 PERCENT.ON JULY 24, BOARD AUTHORIZED COMPANY TO REPURCHASE UP TO AN ADDITIONAL $25.0 BILLION OF ITS CLASS C CAPITAL STOCK..$25 BILLION OF CLASS C CAPITAL STOCK REPURCHASE IS EXPECTED TO BE EXECUTED FROM TIME TO TIME.

headline: Cootek Sees Q2 Revenue Between $34 Million And $36 Million
description: Aug 9 (Reuters) - Cootek (Cayman) Inc <CTK.N>::COOTEK ANNOUNCES REVISED GUIDANCE FOR SECOND QUARTER OF 2019.SEES Q2 REVENUE $34 MILLION TO $36 MILLION.GUIDANCE REVISION IS MAINLY DUE TO DIFFICULTIES THAT COMPANY IS EXPERIENCING IN COLLECTING ITS CONSIDERATION FROM GOOGLE.COOTEK- COMPANY CANNOT GUARANTEE THAT ITS APPEALS WILL PREVAIL OR THAT ANY SUCH SUSPENDED OR REMOVED APPLICATIONS WILL BE MADE AVAILABLE AGAIN.COOTEK - CO IS IN CONTINUOUS COMMUNICATION WITH GOOGLE TO CLARIFY ANY POTENTIAL MISUNDERSTANDINGS AND RESTORE ACCESS TO ITS GLOBAL PORTFOLIO OF APPS.

headline: Telecom Italia signs MoU with Google on cloud business
description: Nov 7 (Reuters) - Telecom Italia says <TLIT.MI>::AGREES MOU WITH GOOGLE CLOUD FOR STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP.AS PART OF GOOGLE CLOUD DEAL IT WILL INVEST IN NEW DATA CENTRES.

headline: Cheetah Mobile Says Informed By Google That Co's Google Play Store, Google Admob And Google Admanager Accounts Have Been Disabled On Feb.20
description: Feb 21 (Reuters) - Cheetah Mobile Inc <CMCM.N>::CHEETAH MOBILE PROVIDES UPDATES ON GOOGLE COLLABORATION.CHEETAH MOBILE - INFORMED BY GOOGLE THAT CO'S GOOGLE PLAY STORE, GOOGLE ADMOB AND GOOGLE ADMANAGER ACCOUNTS HAVE BEEN DISABLED ON FEBRUARY 20, 2020.CHEETAH MOBILE INC - EXPECTS ITS ABILITY TO ATTRACT NEW USERS AND GENERATE REVENUE FROM GOOGLE MAY BE MATERIALLY ADVERSELY AFFECTED FROM FEBRUARY 2020.CHEETAH MOBILE INC - IS IN CONTINUOUS COMMUNICATION WITH GOOGLE TO APPEAL DECISION.CHEETAH MOBILE - CONTRACTS ASSOCIATED WITH CO'S GOOGLE PLAY STORE, GOOGLE ADMOB AND GOOGLE ADMANAGER ACCOUNTS WILL BE TERMINATED.

headline: Cheetah Mobile Announces Fourth Quarter 2019 And Full Year 2019 Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results
description: March 24 (Reuters) - Cheetah Mobile Inc <CMCM.N>::CHEETAH MOBILE ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2019 AND FULL YEAR 2019 UNAUDITED CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL RESULTS.Q4 REVENUE ROSE 55.7 PERCENT TO RMB 612 MILLION.BASIC/DILUTED LOSS PER ADS WAS RMB5.98 (US$0.86) IN Q4 OF 2019.ARE CURRENTLY FACING SOME DIFFICULTIES IN LEGACY MOBILE INTERNET BUSINESS.CHALLENGES ARE NOT CAUSING ANY DAMAGE TO COMPANY AT SYSTEMIC LEVEL.LOOKING INTO 2020, WILL CONTINUE TO IMPLEMENT PRUDENT COST-SAVING MEASURES.BOOKED A GOODWILL IMPAIRMENT CHARGE OF RMB545.7 MILLION (US$78.4 MILLION) IN Q4 OF 2019..FOR Q1 , EXPECTS TOTAL REVENUES TO BE BETWEEN RMB490 MILLION (US$70 MILLION) AND RMB540 MILLION (US$78 MILLION).EXPECTS ABILITY TO ATTRACT NEW USERS AND GENERATE REVENUE FROM GOOGLE MAY BE MATERIALLY ADVERSELY AFFECTED FROM FEB 2020.WAS RECENTLY NOTIFIED THAT GOOGLE WAS UNABLE TO REINSTATE ITS ACCOUNTS AFTER A THOROUGH REVIEW OF ITS APPEAL.COMPANY WILL CONTINUE TO COMMUNICATE WITH GOOGLE.

headline: Fitbit Reports Second Quarter Results For The Three Months Ended July 4, 2020
description: Aug 5 (Reuters) - Fitbit Inc <FIT.N>::FITBIT REPORTS SECOND QUARTER RESULTS FOR THE THREE MONTHS ENDED JULY 4, 2020.Q2 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.39.Q2 REVENUE $261 MILLION.Q2 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.12.Q2 REVENUE ESTIMATE $189 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $-0.22 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.IN QUARTER SOLD 2.5 MILLION DEVICES, DOWN 30% YEAR-OVER-YEAR.QTRLY AVERAGE SELLING PRICE INCREASED 16% YEAR-OVER-YEAR TO $100 PER DEVICE.MAINTAINED COVID-19 CREDIT ALLOWANCE OF $6 MILLION DURING Q2 OF 2020.FITBIT - EXPECT COVID-19 AND ASSOCIATED MITIGATION EFFORTS TO CONTINUE TO HAVE A SIGNIFICANT NEGATIVE IMPACT ON RESULTS IN 2020, INCLUDING LIQUIDITY.FITBIT - STILL EXPECT FITBIT AND GOOGLE TO SECURE NECESSARY REGULATORY APPROVALS AND TO CLOSE TRANSACTION IN 2020, TIME FRAME MAY EXTEND BEYOND THAT.FITBIT - DUE TO PENDING ACQUISITION BY GOOGLE, DOES NOT PLAN TO HOST AN EARNINGS CONFERENCE CALL NOR PROVIDE NEXT-QUARTER OR FULL-YEAR GUIDANCE.

headline: Atari Ships Atari VCS To Its Indiegogo Backers, Integrates Google Chrome
description: Dec 16 (Reuters) - ATARI SA <ATAR.PA>::ATARI VCS: SHIPPING OF THE INDIEGOGO BACKER UNITS ; NATIVE INTEGRATION OF GOOGLE CHROME FOR ENRICHED CONTENT ; RELEASE OF THE DEDICATED VCS COMPANION APP.ATARI WILL RECOGNIZE EUR 2.5M OF REVENUE IN ITS CURRENT FINANCIAL YEAR, PREVIOUSLY RECORDED AS DEFERRED REVENUE IN ITS CONSOLIDATED FINANCIALS FOR YEAR ENDED MARCH 31, 2020.RAMP-UP OF DELIVERIES WILL BE PROGRESSIVE AND WILL REACH A STEADY STATE DURING Q1 OF 2021.

headline: Saudi Aramco To Bring Google Cloud Services To Saudi Arabia
description: Dec 21 (Reuters) - SAUDI ARABIAN OIL CO <2222.SE>::ARAMCO TO BRING GOOGLE CLOUD SERVICES TO SAUDI ARABIA.UNIT SAUDI ARAMCO DEVELOPMENT COMPANY TEAMED UP WITH GOOGLE CLOUD TO OFFER HIGH-PERFORMANCE, LOW-LATENCY CLOUD SERVICES TO CUSTOMERS IN SAUDI ARABIA.SAUDI ARABIA CLOUD REGION ADDED TO GOOGLE CLOUD PLATFORM GLOBAL NETWORK.AGREEMENT BETWEEN SAUDI ARAMCO DEVELOPMENT COMPANY, A SUBSIDIARY OF ARAMCO, AND GOOGLE CLOUD PAVES WAY FOR ROLLOUT OF HIGH-PERFORMANCE, LOW-LATENCY CLOUD SERVICES.OPPORTUNITY TAPS INTO RAPIDLY EXPANDING CLOUD SERVICES DEMAND IN SAUDI ARABIA.Further company coverage: 2222.SE. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Alphabet Inc Reports Second Quarter Revenues Of $61.9 Billion
description: July 27 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::SECOND QUARTER REVENUES OF $61.9 BILLION.QTRLY YOUTUBE ADS REVENUE $7,002 MILLION VERSUS $3,812 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $ 27.26.QTRLY OPERATING MARGIN 31% VERSUS 17 % REPORTED LAST YEAR.QTRLY GOOGLE ADVERTISING REVENUE $50,444 MILLION VERSUS $29,867 MILLION.OTHER BETS REVENUE $192 MILLION VERSUS $148 MILLION.SECOND QUARTER REVENUES OF $61.9 BILLION REFLECT ELEVATED CONSUMER ONLINE ACTIVITY AND BROAD-BASED STRENGTH IN ADVERTISER SPEND.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $19.34, REVENUE VIEW $56.16 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.ALPHABET - ON JULY 22, BOARD  APPROVED AMENDMENT TO STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM PERMITTING CO TO REPURCHASE CLASS A & CLASS C SHARES.QTRLY GOOGLE CLOUD REVENUE $4,628 MILLION VERSUS $3,007 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QTRLY GOOGLE CLOUD OPERATING LOSS $591 MILLION.EFFECT OF CHANGE IN ACCOUNTING ESTIMATE IN QUARTER WAS REDUCTION IN DEPRECIATION EXPENSE OF $721 MILLION, INCREASE IN NET INCOME OF $561 MILLION.Further company coverage: <GOOGL.O>. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Alphabet Reports Quarterly Earnings Per Share Of $27.99
description: Oct 26 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::QTRLY REVENUE $65,118  MILLION VERSUS $46,173 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $27.99.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $23.48, REVENUE VIEW $63.34 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.IN JANUARY 2021, WE COMPLETED AN ASSESSMENT OF THE USEFUL LIVES OF OUR SERVERS AND NETWORK EQUIPMENT.QTRLY GOOGLE ADVERTISING REVENUE $53,130 MILLION VERSUS $37,095 MILLION.QTRLY OPERATING MARGIN 32% VERSUS 24%.QTRLY OTHER BETS REVENUE $182 MILLION VERSUS $178 MILLION.EFFECT OF ADJUSTMENT IN ESTIMATED USEFUL LIFE OF SERVERS WAS INCREASE IN QTRLY NET INCOME OF $460 MILLION.ALPHABET - CHANGE IN ACCOUNTING ESTIMATE FOR 3 & 9 MONTHS ENDED SEPT. 30, RESPECTIVELY LED TO REDUCTION IN DEPRECIATION EXPENSE OF $591 MILLION & $2.1 BILLION.QTRLY GOOGLE CLOUD REVENUE $4,990 MILLION VERSUS $3,444 MILLION.QTRLY YOUTUBE ADS REVENUE $7,205 MILLION VERSUS $5,037 MILLION.QTRLY GOOGLE CLOUD OPERATING LOSS OF $644 MILLION VERSUS LOSS OF $1,208 MILLION.

headline: Alphabet CEO - Q4 Headcount Additions Will Be Significantly Lower Than Q3
description: Oct 25 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET CEO SAYS Q4 HEADCOUNT ADDITIONS WILL BE SIGNIFICANTLY LOWER THAN Q3 - CONF CALL.ALPHABET CHIEF BUSINESS OFFICER SAYS TRAVEL AND RETAIL ADVERTISERS HELPED SEARCH ADS REVENUE IN Q3 - CONF CALL.ALPHABET CHIEF BUSINESS OFFICER SAYS FINANCIAL SERVICES ADVERTISERS INCLUDING CRYPTO PULLED BACK ON AD SPENDING -CONF CALL.ALPHABET CFO SAYS EXPECTS EVEN LARGER HEADWIND FROM FOREIGN EXCHANGE IN Q4 - CONF CALL.ALPHABET CFO SAYS STRONG PERFORMANCE LAST YEAR WILL CONTINUE TO WEIGH ON AD REVENUE GROWTH RATES IN Q4 -CONF CALL.ALPHABET CFO SAYS HEADCOUNT ADDITIONS IN Q4 WILL SLOW TO LESS THAN HALF OF ADDITIONS IN Q3 - CONF CALL.

headline: Netblocks Says Twitter, Facebook And Youtube Now Restricted Across Pakistan Amid Arrest Of Former PM Imran Khan
description: May 9 (Reuters) - :YOUTUBE, TWITTER, FACEBOOK BEING SUSPENDED IN VARIOUS PARTS OF PAKISTAN AFTER IMRAN KHAN'S ARREST -THREE TV CHANNELS.NETBLOCKS SAYS TWITTER, FACEBOOK AND YOUTUBE NOW RESTRICTED ACROSS PAKISTAN AMID ARREST OF FORMER PM IMRAN KHAN.Further company coverage: GOOGL.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Squarespace Enters Definitive Agreement To Acquire Google Domains Assets
description: June 15 (Reuters) - Squarespace Inc <SQSP.N>::SQUARESPACE ENTERS DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE GOOGLE DOMAINS ASSETS.SQUARESPACE INC- PURCHASE INCLUDES APPROXIMATELY 10 MILLION DOMAINS HOSTED ON GOOGLE DOMAINS SPREAD ACROSS MILLIONS OF CUSTOMERS..SQUARESPACE INC - WILL ACQUIRE ASSETS ASSOCIATED WITH GOOGLE DOMAINS BUSINESS, WHICH WILL BE WINDING DOWN FOLLOWING A TRANSITION PERIOD.SQUARESPACE INC SEES DEAL WILL BE MEANINGFULLY ACCRETIVE TO ITS BUSINESS FROM BOTH A REVENUE AND FREE CASH FLOW PERSPECTIVE OVER TIME.SQUARESPACE INC- WHILE MAJORITY OF BENEFITS OF DEAL WILL BE REALIZED IN 2024 AND BEYOND.SQUARESPACE INC- TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE IN Q3 OF 2023.

headline: McDonald's Targets 50,000 Restaurants Globally By End Of 2027
description: Dec 6 (Reuters) - McDonald's Corp <MCD.N>::SAYS TARGETS 50,000 MCDONALD’S RESTAURANTS ACROSS THE WORLD, BY END OF 2027.SAYS CO AND GOOGLE CLOUD ANNOUNCED PARTNERSHIP.SEES 2024 OPERATING MARGIN IN MID TO HIGH 40% RANGE, 2024 CAPEX ABOUT $2.5 BILLION.SAYS PLANS TO INCREASE ITS ACTIVE LOYALTY USER BASE TO 250 MILLION 90-DAY ACTIVE USERS BY 2027.SAYS PLANS TO DELIVER $45 BILLION IN ANNUAL SYSTEMWIDE SALES TO LOYALTY MEMBERS BY 2027.SAYS BEGINNING IN 2024, WILL BEGIN TO DEPLOY NEW, UNIVERSAL SOFTWARE.SIZE OF COMPANY'S CHICKEN BUSINESS IS ON PAR WITH BEEF.COMPANY WILL EXPAND ITS U.S. PILOT OF READY ON ARRIVAL ACROSS ITS TOP SIX MARKETS BY 2025.EXPECTING 30% OF DELIVERY ORDERS TO ORIGINATE IN ITS MOBILE APP BY 2027.PLANS TO DEPLOY BEST BURGER INITIATIVE TO NEARLY ALL MARKETS BY 2026.SEES SEQUENTIAL CAPEX INCREASES OF ABOUT $300-$500 MILLION EACH YEAR THROUGH 2027.

headline: Alphabet CEO Says Cloud Saw Accelerated Growth Driven By Generative AI
description: Jan 30 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET CEO SUNDAR PICHAI SAYS CLOUD SAW ACCELERATED GROWTH DRIVEN BY GENERATIVE AI AND PRODUCT LEADERSHIP - CONF CALL.ALPHABET CEO PICHAI SAYS COMPANY IS EXPERIMENTING WITH GEMINI AI IN SEARCH.ALPHABET CEO PICHAI SAYS GOOGLE ONE IS ABOUT TO CROSS 100 MILLION SUBSCRIBERS.ALPHABET CEO PICHAI SAYS CO'S CLOUD WON AND EXPANDED RELATIONSHIPS WITH LEADING COMPANIES IN Q4 SUCH AS MCDONALD'S.ALPHABET CEO PICHAI SAYS COMPANY HAS WOUND DOWN NON PRIORITY PROJECTS.GOOGLE EXECUTIVE SAYS COMPANY SAW AD STRENGTH IN RETAIL.GOOGLE EXECUTIVE SAYS EFFORTS INCLUDING AI-GENERATED GIFTING RECOMMENDATIONS DROVE INCREMENTAL GROWTH IN KEY Q4 HOLIDAY SHOPPING MOMENTS.ALPHABET CFO SAYS SEARCH REMAINED BIGGEST CONTRIBUTOR TO REVENUE GROWTH.ALPHABET CFO SAYS OPERATING COST INCREASE PRIMARILY REFLECTED GROWING RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT EXPENSES.ALPHABET CFO SAYS AI IS INCREASING CONTRIBUTIONS TO GOOGLE CLOUD.ALPHABET CFO SAYS Q4 CAPEX WAS DRIVEN BY INVESTMENT IN TECHNICAL INFRASTRUCTURE SUCH AS SERVERS AND DATA CENTERS SUPPORTING AI.ALPHABET CFO SAYS 2024 CAPEX WILL BE NOTABLY LARGER.ALPHABET CFO SAYS PRODUCT PRIORITIZATION AND ORGANIZATIONAL DESIGN WORK HAVE RESULTED IN SLOWER PACE OF HIRING.ALPHABET CFO SAYS SEVERANCE-RELATED EXPENSE ESTIMATED TO BE ROUGHLY $700 MILLION IN Q1.ALPHABET CEO SAYS ITS ADVANCED AI OVER TIME WILL BE ABLE TO ACT MORE LIKE AN AGENT AND HANDLE MORE FOLLOW-UP ACTIONS FOR USERS.

headline: Alphabet Records Severance, Related Charges Of $2.1 Bln For The Year Ended December 31, 2023
description: Jan 30 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET INC- QTRLY GOOGLE CLOUD REVENUE $9,192  MILLION VERSUS $7,315 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.ALPHABET INC- QTRLY GOOGLE ADVERTISING REVENUE $ 65,517 MILLION VERSUS $59,042 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.ALPHABET INC:  WE RECORDED EMPLOYEE SEVERANCE AND RELATED CHARGES OF $2.1 BILLION FOR THE TWELVE MONTHS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2023.ALPHABET INC- QTRLY GOOGLE SEARCH & OTHER REVENUE $48,020 	  MILLION VERSUS $42,604 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.ALPHABET INC-QTRLY YOUTUBE ADS REVENUE $9,200 MILLION VERSUS $7,963 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR.ALPHABET INC:  TAKING ACTIONS TO OPTIMIZE OUR GLOBAL OFFICE SPACE.ALPHABET INC: FOR QUARTER ENDED DECEMBER ALPHABET-LEVEL ACTIVITIES INCLUDED CHARGES RELATED TO REDUCTION IN FORCE AND OUR OFFICE SPACE OPTIMIZATION EFFORTS TOTALING $1.2 BLN.ALPHABET INC: EXIT CHARGES RECORDED DURING THREE AND TWELVE MONTHS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2023, WERE $1.2 BLN AND $1.8 BLN, RESPECTIVELY.ALPHABET INC: INCURRED $62 MLN IN ACCELERATED RENT AND ACCELERATED DEPRECIATION FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2023.

headline: Alphabet CFO Ruth Porat Expects Quarterly Capex To Be Roughly Around Q1 Level Of $12 Bln - Conf Call
description: April 25 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET CFO RUTH PORAT EXPECTS QUARTERLY CAPEX TO BE ROUGHLY AROUND Q1 LEVEL OF $12 BILLION - CONF CALL.ALPHABET CFO RUTH PORAT SAYS EXPECT LARGER FOREX HEADWINDS IN Q2.Further company coverage: GOOGL.O. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: CME Group CEO - Plan To Build New Private Google Cloud Region & Co-Location Facility In Aurora, Illinois - Conf. Call
description: July 24 (Reuters) - CME Group Inc <CME.O>::CME GROUP CEO SAYS PLAN TO BUILD NEW PRIVATE GOOGLE CLOUD REGION & CO-LOCATION FACILITY IN AURORA, TO SUPPORT GLOBAL TRADING OF OUR FUTURES & OPTIONS MARKETS - CONF. CALL.

headline: Amazon And Google Filed Parallel Lawsuits To Take Action Against Bigboostup.Com
description: Oct 28 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc <AMZN.O>::AMAZON - AMAZON AND GOOGLE FILE PARALLEL LAWSUITS AGAINST FAKE REVIEW WEBSITE.AMAZON - CO, GOOGLE FILED PARALLEL LAWSUITS TO TAKE ACTION AGAINST BIGBOOSTUP.COM.

headline: Alphabet Waymo To Expand Its Network & Operations Partnerships To Open Up New Markets- CEO Remarks
description: Feb 4 (Reuters) - Alphabet Inc <GOOGL.O>::ALPHABET: WAYMO TO EXPAND ITS NETWORK & OPERATIONS PARTNERSHIPS TO OPEN UP NEW MARKETS, INCLUDING AUSTIN & ATLANTA THIS YEAR, MIAMI NEXT YEAR - CEO REMARKS.Further company coverage: GOOGL.O. ((reuters.briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

headline: Google, Anthropic Discuss Ai Data Security Deals With Snowflake, Databricks - The Information
description: March 11 (Reuters) - :GOOGLE, ANTHROPIC DISCUSS AI DATA SECURITY DEALS WITH SNOWFLAKE, DATABRICKS - THE INFORMATION.SNOWFLAKE IS IN TALKS WITH GOOGLE ABOUT MAKING ITS GEMINI MODELS AVAILABLE SECURELY FOR CUSTOMERS TO BUILD AI APPLICATIONS - THE INFORMATION.SNOWFLAKE EXPECTS DEALS FOR OPENAI AND ANTHROPIC MODELS TO BOOST REVENUE- THE INFORMATION.
